original_text:
For the hand of the Lord will rest on this mountain,
    and Moab shall be trampled down in his place,
    as straw is trampled down in a dunghill.
korean_text: 여호와의 손이 이 산에 나타나시리니 모압이 거름물 속에서 초개가 밟힘 같이 자기 처소에서 밟힐 것인즉

sentences.original_text: For the hand of the Lord will rest on this mountain
and Moab shall be trampled down in his place
as straw is trampled down in a dunghill.
